settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.heading: Free, Fast Shipping
settings.content:
Wait less, ride more. Enjoy fast, free shipping on all ebike conversion kit orders.

  • Delivery within 2 to 7 business days.
  • Free shipping for ebike conversion kits in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom, and United States.
  • Shipped within 24 hours with tracking number.

For more information, please refer to our Shipping Policy.

settings.heading: 1 Year Warranty
settings.content:
Ride in confidence. We’ve got you covered.

  • Motor: 2 years
  • Lithium Barrery: 1 year
  • Controller Display: 1 year
  • Charger: 1 year
  • Other electric parts: 0.5 year

settings.heading: Explore Our Help Center
settings.content: Can’t choose a bike? Need to fix a flat? We’re here to help.

Each box contains a different character, so you never know who you'll get!

settings.heading: The Transformers Toys: The Ultimate Battle, Now in Blind Boxes
settings.text:
Blokees's Transformers Blind Box Series is based on the classic Transformers animated series. The series features 9 regular figures and 1 hidden figure. The regular figures are classic characters from the Transformers universe, including Optimus Prime, Bumblebee, Megatron, and more. The hidden figure is a special version of Optimus Prime with a unique paint job.
The figures in the series are made of high-quality ABS plastic and feature detailed paint jobs. They are approximately 3 inches tall and have a variety of articulation points. The figures can be transformed into robot or vehicle modes.
The series features 9 regular figures and 1 hidden figure. The regular figures are all classic Transformers characters, including:

Step into the world of collective creativity with Blokees! We love seeing your unboxing and building adventures. Share your experience on social media using our special hashtags, or upload your creations to our interactive photo wall. Become part of a community that celebrates every block and build!

Join the Blokees community and show off your building skills! Share your unboxing and creations using #BlokeesBuilders on social media, or post them on our photo wall. Be part of our creative family!

settings.block_title: What's special about the mystery figure in the Galaxy Version 01 Roll Out series?
settings.block_text: The mystery figure in this series is a metal-finish Optimus Prime, offering a premium, metallic texture that distinguishes it from the rest. It's a unique, high-value collectible for fans and collectors.

settings.block_title: Can Blokees Transformers blocks transform into vehicles?
settings.block_text: While our Transformers blocks are designed for dynamic building and posing, they don't transform into vehicles. They are created to provide a unique and imaginative play experience.

settings.block_title: What material are Blokees Transformers made of, and are they safe?
settings.block_text: Blokees Transformers are made from high-grade ABS plastic, rigorously tested and certified by EU CE, EU RoHS, and Swiss SGS standards. This ensures top-notch quality, safety, and environmental friendliness, from particle quality to color fidelity.

settings.block_title: Are Blokees Transformers sets compatible with other sets?
settings.block_text: Yes, all Blokees Transformers sets are designed to be compatible with each other, allowing for expanded and imaginative building experiences.

settings.block_title: What is the recommended age range for Blokees Transformers?
settings.block_text: Our Transformers series is recommended for children aged 6 and up, providing a perfect balance of fun, creativity, and developmental challenge.

settings.block_title: How does Blokees ensure the durability of its Transformers sets?
settings.block_text: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
